title: Honour Level 5 :o
body:
Made a post about hitting honour 4 a couple of weeks ago, just hit level 5 so I thought I'd do a bit of an update :) Still haven't had the luck to receive a single capsule drop :'( Anybody else hit 5 yet?

http://imgur.com/a/pfB6W

http://imgur.com/a/8nLWX

replies.body:
Congrats man!!
You'd be the first I've seen!

:D

Congratulations!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I guess I should start playing a bit more often, as I still have yet to hit Honour 4...

Yes, I'm jelly. Green jelly.
